name: Ramleh
description: '''Ramleh''' are a British [[experimental music]] group formed by musician Gary Mundy in 1982. The current line-up of the band includes Gary Mundy, Anthony di Franco and Stuart Dennison. Originally a part of the English [[power electronics (music)|power electronics]] and [[industrial music]] scene in early 1980s, Ramleh experimented with a more traditional rock format in their later releases.
